products.name: Mailer Boxes
products.description: Custom printed shipping boxes that protect your products while showcasing your brand.
products.fullDescription: Our premium mailer boxes are designed to make a lasting impression from the moment your customers receive their package. Made from high-quality corrugated cardboard, these boxes offer excellent protection while providing a canvas for your brand story. Perfect for e-commerce businesses looking to enhance their unboxing experience.

products.name: Pouches & Bags
products.description: Flexible packaging solutions perfect for food, supplements, and retail products.
products.fullDescription: Versatile stand-up pouches and flat bags that combine functionality with eye-catching design. Our pouches feature advanced barrier properties to keep contents fresh while offering excellent printability for brand messaging. Ideal for food products, supplements, cosmetics, and retail items.

products.name: Folding Cartons
products.description: Premium retail packaging that enhances product presentation and brand experience.
products.fullDescription: Sophisticated folding cartons that elevate your product presentation on retail shelves. These boxes combine structural integrity with premium finishing options to create packaging that customers want to keep. Perfect for cosmetics, electronics, food products, and luxury items.

specifications.Features: Die-cut windows, magnetic closure, ribbon pulls

products.name: Shipping Boxes
products.description: Durable corrugated boxes designed for safe product transport and delivery.
products.fullDescription: Heavy-duty shipping boxes engineered for maximum protection during transit. Our corrugated boxes feature reinforced corners and edges to prevent damage while maintaining cost-effectiveness. Available in various strengths and sizes to accommodate different shipping needs.

products.name: Labels & Stickers
products.description: Custom labels and stickers for branding, product information, and promotional use.
products.fullDescription: High-quality labels and stickers that make your products stand out. Our labels are designed to adhere perfectly to various surfaces while maintaining vibrant colors and sharp text. Perfect for product labeling, promotional campaigns, and brand identification.

specifications.Shapes: Round, square, oval, or custom die-cut

products.name: Tubes & Jars
products.description: Premium squeezable tubes and cosmetic jars for beauty, pharmaceutical, and food products.
products.fullDescription: Professional tubes and jars designed for cosmetics, pharmaceuticals, and food applications. Our plastic and aluminum tubes offer excellent barrier properties with 360° printing capabilities, while our jars provide secure storage with custom branding options. Perfect for creams, lotions, ointments, food pastes, and specialty products requiring precise dispensing or storage.

specifications.Materials: PE, PP, aluminum, or laminated films
specifications.Caps: Flip-top, screw, pump, or squeeze caps

industryProducts.name: Coffee Packaging
industryProducts.description: Premium coffee bags with degassing valves and resealable closures for freshness.
industryProducts.fullDescription: Our coffee packaging solutions are specifically designed to preserve the freshness and aroma of your coffee beans. Featuring one-way degassing valves, resealable zippers, and barrier films that protect against moisture, oxygen, and light. Perfect for roasters and coffee brands looking to maintain quality from roastery to cup.

industryProducts.name: Food Containers
industryProducts.description: Sustainable takeout containers, meal prep boxes, and food storage solutions.
industryProducts.fullDescription: Eco-friendly food containers designed for restaurants, meal prep services, and food delivery. Made from sustainable materials with leak-proof designs and excellent insulation properties. Available in various sizes and configurations to meet your specific food service needs.

industryProducts.name: Cosmetic Boxes
industryProducts.description: Luxury packaging for skincare, makeup, and beauty products with premium finishes.
industryProducts.fullDescription: Elegant cosmetic packaging that enhances your beauty brand's premium image. Our boxes feature luxury finishes, magnetic closures, and custom inserts to showcase your products beautifully. Perfect for skincare sets, makeup collections, and premium beauty products.

industryProducts.name: Supplement Pouches
industryProducts.description: Child-resistant pouches and bottles for vitamins, supplements, and health products.
industryProducts.fullDescription: Specialized packaging for dietary supplements and health products. Our pouches and bottles meet FDA requirements with child-resistant features and tamper-evident seals. Designed to protect product integrity while ensuring consumer safety.

industryProducts.name: Apparel Mailers
industryProducts.description: Branded mailers and poly bags for clothing, accessories, and fashion items.
industryProducts.fullDescription: Stylish shipping solutions for fashion and apparel brands. Our mailers combine protection with brand presentation, featuring custom printing and eco-friendly materials. Perfect for online fashion retailers and subscription box services.

industryProducts.name: Electronics Packaging
industryProducts.description: Anti-static boxes and protective packaging for phones, gadgets, and tech products.
industryProducts.fullDescription: Specialized packaging for electronic devices and components. Our anti-static materials protect sensitive electronics while custom inserts ensure secure fit and professional presentation. Ideal for consumer electronics, components, and tech accessories.

industryProducts.name: Jewelry Boxes
industryProducts.description: Elegant presentation boxes for rings, necklaces, and luxury jewelry items.
industryProducts.fullDescription: Exquisite jewelry packaging that reflects the value and beauty of your pieces. Our boxes feature premium materials, velvet inserts, and elegant designs that create memorable unboxing experiences for luxury jewelry brands.

specifications.Finish: Embossed, foil stamped, or leather texture
specifications.Sizes: Ring, earring, necklace, and set boxes

industryProducts.name: Book Mailers
industryProducts.description: Protective mailers and rigid boxes for books, magazines, and printed materials.
industryProducts.fullDescription: Reliable shipping solutions for publishers and book retailers. Our mailers provide excellent protection against bending and damage while maintaining cost-effectiveness for high-volume shipping. Available in various sizes for different book formats.

industryProducts.name: Gift Boxes
industryProducts.description: Festive packaging for holidays, corporate gifts, and special occasions.
industryProducts.fullDescription: Beautiful gift boxes that make every occasion special. Our seasonal and custom gift boxes feature premium finishes, ribbon details, and elegant designs perfect for corporate gifting, holidays, and special celebrations.

specifications.Closure: Ribbon tie, magnetic, or lift-off lid
specifications.Finish: Foil stamping, embossing, or specialty coatings
specifications.Occasions: Holiday, corporate, wedding, and event themes
